questions.question_text: What is your primary role in the manufacturing process?

options.option_text: Quality Inspector (Shop Floor)
Engineering Team Member (Office-based)
Manufacturing Technician
Production Supervisor
Quality Assurance Manager

questions.question_text: How do you currently conduct quality inspections and measurements?

options.option_text: Manual measurements with calipers and visual inspection only
Photo-based measurement tools with some manual verification
Automated measurement systems with digital documentation
Mixed approach - combination of manual and digital tools
No systematic measurement process currently in place

questions.question_text: What is your biggest challenge with current measurement accuracy and consistency?

options.option_text: Inconsistent measurements between different inspectors
Time-consuming manual measurement processes
Difficulty in documenting and tracking measurement data
Lack of real-time feedback on quality status
Limited ability to detect defects early in the process

questions.question_text: How do you currently handle documentation and reporting of quality data?

options.option_text: Paper-based forms and manual record keeping
Excel spreadsheets with manual data entry
Digital quality management system with some automation
Automated data capture with integrated reporting
No systematic documentation process

questions.question_text: What level of precision tolerance management do you currently maintain?

options.option_text: Basic pass/fail criteria without detailed tolerance tracking
Defined tolerance ranges but manual verification process
Automated tolerance checking with real-time alerts
Statistical process control with trend analysis
No formal tolerance management system

questions.question_text: How do you currently handle non-conforming parts and quality issues?

options.option_text: Manual identification and physical segregation
Digital flagging with workflow notifications
Automated rejection with full traceability
Root cause analysis with corrective action tracking
No systematic non-conformance management

questions.question_text: What would be your top priority for improving your current quality inspection workflow?

options.option_text: Increase measurement speed and efficiency
Improve measurement accuracy and repeatability
Better integration between measurement tools and documentation
Real-time quality monitoring and alerts
Enhanced traceability and audit capabilities
Automated defect detection and classification
